# Yusuf Talha ARABACI

> Cyber Security Engineer & Digital Sovereignty Architect

- **Role:** Cyber Security Engineer
- **Location:** Turkey (Open to relocation to Tallinn, Estonia - Q1 2026)
- **Website:** https://yusufarbc.dev
- **GitHub:** https://github.com/yusufarbc
- **LinkedIn:** https://linkedin.com/in/yusufarbc
- **Contact:** yusuftalhaarabaci@hotmail.com

## Summary
Cyber Security Engineer combining offensive foundations and enterprise SOC experience with digital sovereignty and cloud-native security strategies. Focused on replacing traditional dependencies with open-source, secure, and autonomous infrastructures.

## Experience
- **Cyber Security Engineer** @ Arma Bilisim (Oct 2025 - Present)
  - SIEM, XDR, EPP, DLP, Threat Hunting, Incident Response.
- **SOC Analyst** @ Garanti BBVA Technology (Dec 2024 - Nov 2025)
  - Security Event Monitoring, Threat Detection, Forensic Investigations.
- **MDR Analyst** @ ADEO Cyber Security (Sep 2023 - Aug 2024)
  - Network Security (Wazuh, Sentinel, Defender XDR), DLP, EDR, Log Analysis.
- **Intern IT Services & Security** @ Consulta (Apr 2023 - Sep 2023)
  - IT Infrastructure, Linux Hardening, Exchange Server Support.

## Technical Skills
- **Security Operations:** SentinelOne, Microsoft Defender XDR, CrowdStrike Falcon, Palo Alto Cortex XDR, Wazuh, Splunk, Elastic Stack.
- **Vulnerability & Assessment:** OpenVAS, Nuclei, Nmap, Metasploit, Burp Suite, OWASP ZAP, Wireshark.
- **Cloud & Infrastructure:** Docker, Nextcloud, Ansible, Proxmox VE, Kubernetes, Prometheus, Grafana.
- **Languages & Backend:** Node.js, Python, Bash, PowerShell, C/C++, Assembly (x86), SQL.

## Featured Projects
- **Nalburdeposu E-Commerce:** Complete e-commerce platform with PERN stack (Postgres, Express, React, Node). [Repo](https://github.com/yusufarbc/nalburdeposu-pern-ecommerce)
- **NPM Supply Chain Analysis:** Analyzing dependency networks for critical nodes and risks. [Repo](https://github.com/yusufarbc/npm-supply-chain-network-analysis)
- **ApiGoat:** Deliberately vulnerable REST API for learning OWASP Top 10 API risks. [Repo](https://github.com/yusufarbc/apigoat)
- **MCP Agentic Security:** Security review of Model Context Protocol and agent interoperability. [Repo](https://github.com/yusufarbc/mcp-agentic-ai-security)
- **WebVuln Runner:** Docker-based TUI for deploying vulnerable web environments options. [Repo](https://github.com/yusufarbc/webvuln-runner)
- **ANKA UAV Software:** Autonomous flight control software for Teknofest 2022. [Repo](https://github.com/yusufarbc/anka-uav-tekno2022)
